tool_description:
Best Instagram Scraper API 2023 
● Launched in May 2023 
● 100% real-time data, no cache, no-CORS media, advanced profile, get access to hidden insights & more.
title: Instagram API 2023

api_list.name: Get child comments by media_id and comment_id
api_list.description:
Get child comments of post/reel/igtv/etc using media_id and comment_id.
You can pass `next_min_child_cursor` from response to `min_id` for next child comments.

Please make sure you don't add `/` at the end of url.

optional_parameters.name: min_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `min_id` empty for first request then provide `next_min_child_cursor ` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/media_child_comments/{media_id}/{comment_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get insights of post/reel by shortcode
api_list.description: Get hidden insights such as `save_count`, `share_count` of any post, reel using shortcode.  You can find more details [here(tutorial).](https://rapidapi.com/mrngstar/api/instagram-api-20231/tutorials/hidden-insights-of-public-posts,-reels)

required_parameters.name: shortcode
required_parameters.description:
**How to find shortcode?**
www.instagram.com/reel/CrgVBtHr3DP/ here **CrgVBtHr3DP** is shortcode.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/media_insights_from_shortcode/{shortcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get insights of post/reel by media_id
api_list.description: Get hidden insights such as `save_count`, `share_count` of any post, reel using media_id.  You can find more details [here(tutorial).](https://rapidapi.com/mrngstar/api/instagram-api-20231/tutorials/hidden-insights-of-public-posts,-reels)

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/media_insights/{media_id}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: User Feed Insights
api_list.description:
User Feed Insights 

Endpoint is available on request, please contact us for the custom plan.
**Update:** We are sorry, this endpoint is not available due to some issues from Instagram side, please try media insights from shortcode/media ID endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Count should be between **1-500**. Default value is 1.

api_list.name: Location posts
api_list.description:
Get posts from `location_id`. 
You can use previous endpoint to get location_id from city names. Use `pk` from previous endpoint response as `location_id`

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: Use previous endpoint to get `location_id` from city names. Use `pk` from previous endpoint response as `location_id` here.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/location_media/{location_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get user followers by user_id
api_list.description: Get followers of an Instagram user using user_id.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
**Optional**
Count should be between 1-100. If not we will use the default value.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/user_followers/{user_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: number of posts

api_list.name: No CORS HD profile photo
api_list.description:
Fetch no CORS HD profile picture of a Instagram user. 
No CORS image urls will expire after 30 days from date of creation.

Along with original no CORS image, you will get thumbnail & display_url for the same.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/nocors_profile/{user_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: No CORS images from shortcode
api_list.description:
Fetch no CORS image urls of posts, stories & reels. Please note currently we only support images. No CORS image urls will expire after 30 days from date of creation.
**Note: For carousel media having more than 5 images, this endpoint will take some time to generate no CORS image urls for all carousel media of posts.**

required_parameters.name: shortcode
required_parameters.description:
**How to find shortcode?**
In www.instagram.com/p/CsB0gIFAxUB/ , here **CsB0gIFAxUB** is shortcode.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/nocors_media_from_shortcode/{shortcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get active, archived stories of user by date wise using user_id
api_list.description:
Get active. archived stories of a user by date wise using user_id.
Main feature of this endpoint is to get active stories & highlight stories date wise.
**Note**: archived stories are stories which are present in highlights.

optional_parameters.name: end_cursor
optional_parameters.description: Leave `end_cursor` empty for first request then provide `end_cursor` received from previous request to get more items.

}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get like details of any media by shortcode
api_list.description:
Get all users who liked a particular post/reel/IGTV/etc using shortcode.
You can fetch upto 9000 users(upto 5MB of response). Please make sure your systems are capable of handling too much data otherwise you can use 1000 count value.

required_parameters.name: shortcode
required_parameters.description:
**How to find shortcode?**
www.instagram.com/p/CrgVBtHr3DP/ here **CrgVBtHr3DP** is shortcode.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
By default you will get 100 users data. 
1 < count < 9000

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/media_likes_from_shortcode/{shortcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get user followings by user_id
api_list.description: Get followings of an Instagram user using user_id.

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `next_max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description:
**Optional**
Count should be between 1-100. If not we will use the default value.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/user_following/{user_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get public contact details by user_id
api_list.description: Get public contact details such as phone number, email, address, etc of an Instagram user using user_id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com/api/public_contact_info/{user_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-20231.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
